abstract: A set of options affecting the delivery of video asset data that you request from an image manager.

source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/Photos/PHVideoRequestOptions

# PHVideoRequestOptions

**Class**

A set of options affecting the delivery of video asset data that you request from an image manager.

## Declaration

```swift
class PHVideoRequestOptions
```

## Specifying Video Request Options

- **version**: The version of the video to request.
- **PHVideoRequestOptionsVersion**: Options for requesting a video asset with or without adjustments, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHVideoRequestOptions/version] property.
- **deliveryMode**: A mode specifying the requested video quality and delivery priority.
- **PHVideoRequestOptionsDeliveryMode**: Options for delivering requested video data, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHVideoRequestOptions/deliveryMode] property.

## Fetching Video Data from iCloud

- **isNetworkAccessAllowed**: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested video from iCloud.
- **progressHandler**: A block Photos calls periodically while downloading the video.
- **PHAssetVideoProgressHandler**: The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset data from iCloud. Used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHVideoRequestOptions/progressHandler] property.

## Asset loading

- **Loading and Caching Assets and Thumbnails**: Request image, video, or Live Photos content, and cache for quick reuse.
- **PHImageManager**: An object that facilitates retrieving or generating preview thumbnails and asset data.
- **PHCachingImageManager**: An object that facilitates retrieving or generating preview thumbnails, optimized for batch preloading large numbers of assets.
- **PHImageRequestOptions**: A set of options affecting the delivery of still image representations of Photos assets you request from an image manager.
- **PHLivePhotoRequestOptions**: A set of options affecting the delivery of Live Photo assets you request from an image manager.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
